nodes.text: The Mandate was a starship in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. Before serving on the Advance and being drafted into the Imperial Special Forces group Inferno Squad by Admiral Garrick Versio in 0 ABY, Gideon Hask served aboard the Mandate with valor following his graduation from the Royal Imperial Academy on Coruscant.
The Mandate was first mentioned in the 2017 novel Battlefront II: Inferno Squad, by Christie Golden.
